alert.note: Alert for Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 10:16PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN MORTON COUNTY THROUGH 1045 PM CDT... At 1014 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Sweet Briar Lake, moving west at 5 mph. Other storms were developing along a line from 5 miles southeast of New Salem to 2 miles west of Mandan. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mandan, New Salem, Judson, Sweet Briar Lake, Crown Butte Lake, Fish Creek Dam and Fort Abraham Lincoln State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
